meanings.sent1: I had to deselect some items from my shopping cart.
meanings.sent2: Remember to deselect the unwanted options before finalizing your order.
meanings.sent3: It's like playing a game of 'pick and un-pick' when you deselect items.
meanings.sent4: She carefully deselected the incorrect answers like a skilled surgeon removing tumors.
meanings.sent5: The delete button is your best friend when you need to deselect mistakes.

meanings.sent1: I will deselect that option because it doesn't suit my needs.
meanings.sent2: If you don't like any, just deselect them all and start over.
meanings.sent3: He decided to deselect all the flavors and stick with vanilla.
meanings.sent4: She would rather deselect than settle for something she doesn't love.
meanings.sent5: In a sea of choices, she knew she had to deselect until she found the perfect one.
